}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *[https://www.4gltemall.com/sierra-wireless-airprime-em7355.html ''Sierra Wireless AirPrime EM7355'' on '''4G|LTEmall'''] :[[Qualcomm]] MDM9615 (Gobi5000/Dell DW5808e) *[https://forums.lenovo.com/t5/ThinkPad-T400-T500-and-newer-T/T440-install-Sierra-Wireless-AirPrime-Model-EM7355/td-p/3379762 ''Sierra Wireless AirPrime EM7355'' on '''Lenovo''' forum] :''EM7355'' - [https://usb-ids.gowdy.us/read/UD/1199/ USB ID]: 1199:901e / 1199:901f :''HP LT4111'' - USB ID: 03f0:4e1d / 03f0:5a1d
''Reliable 4G LTE Cat-3 wireless connectivity'' :''with 3G and 2G fallback for the Americas''
*''Carriers:'' [[AT&T]], [[Bell]], [[Rogers]], [[Sprint]], [[Telus]], [[T-Mobile]], [[Verizon]] *''Bands:'' LTE: B2, B4, B5, B13, B17, B25 *''Fallback:'' 2G, 3G
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.sierrawireless.com/products-and-solutions/embedded-solutions/products/em7355/ Technical Specs]
